SEARCH

Class PlayerGUI

java.lang.Object
PlayerGUI
public class PlayerGUI extends Object
Represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for a player. Diplays a player's number cards and trump cards. Displays a trump card's description if prompted to.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerGUI

      public PlayerGUI(Player p)
      Initializes a PlayerGUI object which uses the information from the given player. Stores the player's number only for window formatting.
      Parameters:
      p - the player

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the GUI. Initializes the window and sounds.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the GUI. Closes the game window in a fashion similar to hitting the "x" manually.

    • setAbleToGetClick

      public void setAbleToGetClick(boolean status)
      Sets if the window is able to get mouse input.
      Parameters:
      status - boolean if window is able to get mouse input

    • setFrameLocation

      public void setFrameLocation(int x, int y)
      Sets the frame's location on the screen.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the location
      y - the y coordinate of the location

    • updateHand

      public void updateHand()
      Redraws this player's hand based on the player's information

    • writeTrumpCardDescription

      public void writeTrumpCardDescription(int value, String type)
      Writes the description for the trump card based on its information
      Parameters:
      value - the value of the trump card
      type - the type of the trump card

    • clearTrumpCardDescription

      public void clearTrumpCardDescription()
      Clears the description for the trump card

      public MouseEvent nextMouseClick()
      Waits for and returns the next mouse click within the player's window.
